High-performance 3-tier structure.

Second layer cuts up to 99% of particles such as bacteria and pollen.
Third layer uses the same AIRism Mesh as the first layer for improved breathability.

items.longDescription:
PEANUTS Holiday

A collection of loungewear for the holiday season, with designs featuring Snoopy, Woodstock and Charlie Brown. Enjoy time spent at home with family and loved ones while wearing these delightful, newly added items.

© 2021 Peanuts Worldwide LLC
items.name: WOMEN Peanuts Fleece Long Sleeve Set
items.shortDescription: The “Peanuts” Gang makes time spent at home more fun and special.

items.longDescription:
OTTAIPNU

OTTAIPNU is a textile brand developed by Masaru Suzuki. Focusing on vivid print textiles, he has developed a collection of umbrellas, bags, towels, handkerchiefs and more that showcase the intrinsic charm of the fabric.

Masaru Suzuki
Textile Designer
He has taken part in projects and collaborations with various brands inside and outside of Japan. Besides textiles, he provides patterns and designs centered on his own textiles, for use in furniture and architectural spaces.

©OTTAIPNU All right Reserved
